EmailTemplate.description: In USE When Program Approver approves Funding opportunity Then email is sent to Funding Opportunity Owner
EmailTemplate.name: RFA - Program Manager approves Funding opportunity email to FO Owner
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: RFA #{!Announcement__c.AnnouncementId__c} has been Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Announcement__c.OwnerFirstName},
This email is to notify you that, the Announcement # {!Announcement__c.AnnouncementId__c} has been Approved for the Program # {!Announcement__c.Program__c}.
Kindly login to the EGMS Systems and click here to see Announcement details.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely, EGMS Team
